content: ❤️ in this crochet tutorial we ll make a bunny step by step perfect for gifts and decoration it s super cute and quick to make ✨ español https //youtu be/fu6hmcrqgps english https //youtu be/9hlmoyqceso you can find the written pattern from the video in pdf complete https //amigurumisatina etsy com/listing/4342793897 materials used chenille yarn light gray you can find it here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_depmvpp cotton yarn white 19 you can find it here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_onohllm difficulty level 2/5 available languages english spanish final size 26 cm / 10 2 inches tall varies depending on materials used ❤️ if you love amigurumis and want to discover more fun and unique patterns please subscribe to my youtube channel and turn on the notification bell so you don t miss any new videos ❤️ note this pattern is for personal use only please do not share upload or distribute it on social media or any other platform ✅ you re welcome to sell the finished items don t forget to give credit to amigurumisatina as the designer enjoy crocheting and may your bunny come to life with lots of love ♥
